name: Spoderman 2: Highway to Hell
description:
After Spodermen has left FaZe HQ in the previous installment, he is looking for his primary interest: Bitches and Dorito’s. Spodermen notices the Avengers have the best of both. So he decided to join them. But Spodermen needs the signature of uncle Ben, who died. Thus begins spodermen his journey to hell to get his paper signed.

If you get stuck press space, or if you are on mobile put 5 fingers on the screen at the same time.

If you really want to skip the cutscenes, just spam the screen with left mouse button or with your finger.

Can you discover the alternate ending?
